DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate rate nausea nutritional status patient hyperemesis gravidarum ( severe nausea vomit pregnancy ) healthy pregnant woman use questionnaire ( PUQE-score ) , self-reported food/drink intake form blood test . The Investigators aim develop normal range prealbumin measurement ( reference value ) first trim pregnancy .
DOC.detailed_description: Women affect hyperemesis gravidarum severe nutritional risk . Reference value biochemical parameter evaluate nutritional status early pregnancy need determine . The investigator compare clinical nutritional parameter ( weight gain/weight loss ) rate nausea ( PUQE-questionnaire ) , self-reported nutritional intake form biochemical measurement ( prealbumin ) woman admit hospital hyperemesis gravidarum healthy pregnant woman . For hyperemesis patient measurement repeat discharge .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman < 16 week gestation Admitted hospital hyperemesis gravidarum ( HG group ) nausea vomit pregnancy least two follow criterion ; weight loss , dehydration , fluid/electrolyte disturbance , ketonuria Nonviable pregnancy diagnose time inclusion Unable understand Norwegian PUQEscore > = 13 ( control group ) Nausea vomit pregnancy cause condition Hyperemesis gravidarum
